Kagendo Murungi (7 Disemba 1971 na 27 Disemba 2017) bụ onye Kenya na-ahụ maka ụmụnwanyị, onye na-ahụ Maka ihe ndị ruuru LGBT na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-akwado ikike nke ndị LGBTQ nke Afrịka ruo ihe karịrị afọ 20.
A mụrụ Kagendo na Kenya ma o nwee ụmụnne isii. Ọ kwagara na United States ebe ọ nọrọ ihe ka ukwuu n'oge ndụ ya
Kagendo nwetara nzere BA ya na ọmụmụ ụmụnwanyị na Mahadum Rutgers wee gaa n'ihu na MA ya na ọmụmụ mgbasa ozi site na New School for Social Research
Ọ gara n'ihu n'ọrụ ya na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri dị ka onye nduzi ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri

O guzobere ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nkiri Wapinduzi Productions n'afọ 1991 ma jee ozi dị ka onye na-emepụta ya ruo ihe dị ka afọ 26. Ọ kọrọ akụkọ ahụ maka ihe nkiri America nke afọ 1995 These Girls Are Missing
O nyere aka n'ịmepụta ọrụ onye ọrụ mmemme Africa na International Gay & Lesbian Human Rights Commission
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ afọ ofufo maka African Film Festival ruo afọ iri na ise. O jikwa ọkwa nke Program Associate na National Black Programming Consortium mgbe ọ ka bụ onye nhazi obodo
N'afọ 2016, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nduzi nke Food Pantry na St
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2021, edepụtara ya dị ka otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị Afrịka asaa na-eme ihe ike nke kwesịrị isiokwu Wikipedia site na Global Citizen, otu mba ụwa na òtù nkwado.
Ọ nwụrụ na 27 Disemba 2017 mgbe ọ dị afọ 46 n'ụlọ ya na Harlem
E liri ya n'ugbo ezinụlọ ya na Kenya.
